issue.title: [Python] Fix to_pandas() export for timestamps within structs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9223](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9223). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently timestamps within structs unilaterally have their timezone discarded for backwards compatibility reasons.  There is a TODO in the code to come up with a better solution.  This Jira tracks the solution.
